Author: coiin#0708
Content: @Kyung-Nam Park there is no libcurl-gnutls.so.4 in cent os.  Only libcurl.so.4  Try   sudo ln -s /usr/lib64/libcurl.so.4 /usr/lib64/libcurl-gnutls.so.4

Author: coiin#0708
Content: sudo ln -s /usr/lib64/libcurl.so.4    /usr/lib64/libcurl-gnutls.so.4   (there is a space!)

Author: Oliver Westbrook#7752
Content: Hey guys, I'm really new to blockchain dev and working on a project to claim kmd interest using bitcore lib.  My question is pretty simple, functionally can I claim interest if I specify the address and change address, correct fee, etc?  Or is there a particular procedure that needs to be followed to claim interest?

Author: Oliver Westbrook#7752
Content: I'm looking through the js files for Agama-Web as reference but wanted to see if anyone here has a quick answer

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content: if i'm not mistaken you need to set the nlocktime in the past so time -777 to accept it in the next block

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content: github.com/LedgerHQ/ledger-nano-s/issues/21

Author: Oliver Westbrook#7752
Content: Ah, cool.  Thank you looking into that.

Author: Oliver Westbrook#7752
Content: @CHMEX I'm referring to collecting the interest.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: just spend the utxo. (sum of vins + interest) - (sum of outputs) -> is the txfee

Author: Oliver Westbrook#7752
Content: Ah, ok.  Thank you @jl777c

Author: Regnar#6164
Content: Hey @ca333 Just wondering if we can integrate all repos into KomodoPlatform repo? Or what may be the reason we don't? I was talking with SHossain about updating some aspects of the Komodo Platform Github to better represent the work that is being done. It seems I often spend time dealing with FUD about lack of developer activity due to the insights feature on Github. So things like the scaling stuff, mm2.0, cryptoconditions, etc. SHossain just added the links to these to the "Source of all KomodoPlatform Repositories and Releases" but this doesn't change the "insights" results which often people perform cursory checks on to see if a project is inactive. Thanks.
